splits.name: 6502_multiply_constant_shift
splits.description: 6502 multiplication techniques - strength reduction, multiplying by constants using ASL/ROL shifts, powers of two, arbitrary constants via shift-and-add

splits.name: 6502_multiply_general_16bit
splits.description: 6502 general multiplication - 8x8-bit and 16x16-bit unsigned multiplication routines using shift-and-add algorithm, with complete assembly code

splits.name: 6502_division_algorithms
splits.description: 6502 division techniques - dividing by constants, general unsigned division routines (8-bit and 16-bit), shift-and-subtract algorithm

splits.name: 6502_signed_math
splits.description: 6502 signed integer multiplication and division - sign handling wrappers around unsigned routines, two's complement considerations
